        public void createMCQQuestion(MCQQuestion question,
                              Quiz quiz)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              CreateFailedException

        Creates an MCQ Question in the database

        If a problem occurs throws a CreateFailedException

        usage example : MCQQuestionJDBCDAO mcqquestiondao = new... try{ mcqquestiondao.createMCQQuestion (MCQQuestionInstance, QuizInstance)}; catch (CreateFailed e)
        Parameters:
        question - The MCQquestion that is created
        quiz - The Quiz associated with the MCQQuestion
        Throws:
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the MCQ question is not created
        java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        quiz - The quiz associated with the MCQquestions
        Returns:
        mcqquestionlist returns a list of MCQ questions associated with the quiz

      • deleteMCQQuestionByQuizId

        public void deleteMCQQuestionByQuizId(Quiz quiz)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                      DeleteFailedException

        Deletes the MCQ Questions of a quiz

        This method is called when a quiz is deleted

        When a quiz is deleted, all the MCQ Questions associated with the quiz are deleted to preserve the referential integrity

        If a problem occurs throws the DeleteFailedException

        usage example : MCQQuestionJDBCDAO mcqquestiondao = new .. try{ mcqquestiondao.deleteMCQQuestionByQuizId(QuizInstance);} catch (ReadFailed e)
        Parameters:
        quiz - The quiz associated with the MCQQuestions
        Throws:
        DeleteFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the MCQ Question is not deleted
        java.sql.SQLException
